mapper.select: select count(*) from assess_querybx where assess_querybx.appkey
select * from assess_querybx aq,kj_jbzxapiuser kj where aq.appkey=kj.appkey order by aq.dt_add desc limit #{0},#{1}
select auto_increment from information_schema.`TABLES` where table_name=#{0} and TABLE_SCHEMA=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into assess_querybx( id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, imgurl, bc_status, query_type, gems_id, gems_fs_id, gems_code, c_carvin, c_carfdjh, c_carno, c_cardno, result_imgurl1, result_imgurl2, result_imgurl3, result_imgurl4, result_imgurl5, result_imgurl6, result_imgurl7, result_imgurl8, result_imgurl9, result_imgurl10, result_imgurl11, result_imgurl12, result_imgurl13, result_imgurl14, result_imgurl15, result_imgurl16, result_imgurl17, result_imgurl18, result_imgurl19, result_imgurl20, result_imgurl21, result_imgurl22, result_imgurl23, result_imgurl24, result_imgurl25, result_imgurl26, result_imgurl27, result_imgurl28, result_imgurl29, result_imgurl30, api_result, api_msg, api_code, appkey )values( #{id}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{imgurl}, #{bc_status}, #{query_type}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_code}, #{c_carvin}, #{c_carfdjh}, #{c_carno}, #{c_cardno}, #{result_imgurl1}, #{result_imgurl2}, #{result_imgurl3}, #{result_imgurl4}, #{result_imgurl5}, #{result_imgurl6}, #{result_imgurl7}, #{result_imgurl8}, #{result_imgurl9}, #{result_imgurl10}, #{result_imgurl11}, #{result_imgurl12}, #{result_imgurl13}, #{result_imgurl14}, #{result_imgurl15}, #{result_imgurl16}, #{result_imgurl17}, #{result_imgurl18}, #{result_imgurl19}, #{result_imgurl20}, #{result_imgurl21}, #{result_imgurl22}, #{result_imgurl23}, #{result_imgurl24}, #{result_imgurl25}, #{result_imgurl26}, #{result_imgurl27}, #{result_imgurl28}, #{result_imgurl29}, #{result_imgurl30}, #{api_result}, #{api_msg}, #{api_code}, #{appkey} )
